news.title: REVOCATION, DYING FETUS, SUFFERING HOUR & More Added To Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week
news.summary: This week's top tracks include Metal Injection's Artist Of The Month Revocation plus some seriously crushing riffage from Dying Fetus. The return of Suffering Hour, a chaotic one from Better and more added to the list.

news.title: SUFFERING HOUR Returns With New Single "Revelation Of Mortality", New 10" Due Out In October
news.summary:
"I think this is a special release and shows where we've been and where we're currently at, spiritually and mentally."

news.title: DYING FETUS Unleash New Single "Into The Cesspool" Ahead Of North American Tour
news.summary: Death metal overlords Dying Fetus have dropped a brand-new single, "Into The Cesspool" The track arrives just one week before the launch of the band's North American tour.

news.title: DREAM THEATER Announce Quarantième: Live À Paris 40th Anniversary Concert Release
news.summary:
To mark the announcement, the band has shared a live version of "Overture 1928 / Strange Déjà Vu". 
 The post  DREAM THEATER Announce Quarantième: Live À Paris 40th Anniversary Concert Release  appeared first on  Metal Injection .

news.title: NIKKI SIXX On MÖTLEY CRÜE's Absence From Back To The Beginning: "We Couldn't Do It Even If We Wanted To"
news.summary:
